mapper.sql: WITH PAGE_INFO AS ( SELECT CONVERT(integer, #{PAGE_SIZE}) PAGE_SIZE , CONVERT(integer, #{PAGE_NUM}) PAGE_NUM ) , LST AS ( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PAGE_KEY) RNUM FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT A.MSGGRPSEQNO ,A.SEQNO ,REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), A.RESERVEDATE, 120), '-' , '.') AS RESERVEDATE ,A.APPID ,A.GROUPSEQ ,A.SENDERSEQ ,(SELECT SENDERCODE FROM T_PUSH_SENDER_INFO B WHERE A.SENDERSEQ = B.SENDERSEQ) AS SENDERCODE ,A.MESSAGE ,REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), A.REGDATE, 120), '-' , '.') AS REGDATE ,A.STATE FROM T_PUSH_MESSAGE_GROUP A WHERE MSGGRPSEQNO = #{MSGGRPSEQNO}

SELECT A.SEQNO , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), A.RESERVEDATE, 120), '-' , '.') AS RESERVEDATE ,A.APPID ,A.CUID ,A.SENDERSEQ ,(SELECT SENDERCODE FROM T_PUSH_SENDER_INFO B WHERE A.SENDERSEQ = B.SENDERSEQ) AS SENDERCODE ,A.MESSAGE ,REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), A.REGDATE, 120), '-' , '.') AS REGDATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RESERVEDATE ASC, REGDATE DESC, SEQNO, CUID) PAGE_KEY FROM T_PUSH_MESSAGE A WHERE SEQNO = #{SEQNO}
